attributes.action: make it illegal to move the bodies of any Tamils who starve themselves to death outside the Houses of Parliament without first obtaining money from the Sri Lankan embassy to pay for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What they are protesting about has nothing to do with this country nor the people of this country so if these people want to starve themselves to death then they should be allowed to do so.  BUT NONE OF WHAT THEY DO SHOULD BE PAID FOR OUT OF THE TAXES TAKEN FROM THE BRITISH TAXPAYER UNDER THREAT OF CRIMINALISATION.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
